titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal alternative minimum tax limitations on private activity bond interest, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S115-116)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt interest earned on tax-exempt private activity bonds from the alternative minimum tax (AMT) and to exclude such interest as an adjustment to current earnings for purposes of computing alternative minimum taxable income.
